General.Name: Central China Securities Co. Ltd
General.Description: Central China Securities Co., Ltd., a securities company, engages in the securities brokerage, credit, futures, proprietary trading, investment banking and management, and other businesses. It trades in stocks, funds, and bonds on behalf of its customers. The company also provides investment advisory, financial planning, and other services; financing services, such as margin trading and securities lending, securities repurchase, and securities-backed lending; and futures brokering, asset management, investment consultation, and private fund management services, as well as risk management services. In addition, it is involved in the underwriting and sponsorship of equity securities; and bond underwriting business, as well as financial advisory services for mergers, acquisitions and restructuring, and new businesses. Further, the company offers stocks, bonds, funds, derivatives, and other financial products; and capital market services, including securities brokerage, margin financing, futures brokerage, investment banking, securities research, and proprietary investment, etc. Central China Securities Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 2002 and is headquartered in Zhengzhou, China.
General.Address: 10 Business Outer Ring Road, Zhengzhou, China, 450018
